name: Zombies Graveyard
description:
**************************** HOME ZOMBIE *****************************

Try inter to Graveyard.you have to war with Zombie.

Also featuring Game Center feature built-in!

~ Universal App - iPhone, iPhone5, iPod Touch, iPad & iPad Mini Compatible!

~ Gorgeous Graphics!

~ Gorgeous Sound and Music!

~ Play vs Friends Score challenge feature!

~ Game Center Feature!

The Zombies are in the home "Graveyard", and they need your kind, get jumping! get shooting!
